channel.title: Urgent help needed please!
channel.description:
Hey guys, my server was running fine then suddenly I dc'd, I restarted the server and everytime I logged in this happened in the CMD;
[code]Server bound to port - 43594 java.lang.NullPointerException at org.dementhium.model.player.Bonuses.getBonus(Bonuses.java:63) at org.dementhium.model.combat.MagicFormulae.getMaximumMagicDefence(Magi cFormulae.java:94) at org.dementhium.model.combat.MagicFormulae.getDamage(MagicFormulae.jav a:31) at org.dementhium.model.combat.impl.spells.NPCSpell.castSpell(NPCSpell.j ava:29) at org.dementhium.model.combat.impl.MagicAction.commenceSession(MagicAct ion.java:62) at org.dementhium.model.combat.CombatAction.execute(CombatAction.java:38 ) at org.dementhium.model.combat.CombatExecutor$1.run(CombatExecutor.java: 81) at org.dementhium.model.combat.CombatExecutor.tick(CombatExecutor.java:9 6) at org.dementhium.task.impl.NPCTickTask.execute(NPCTickTask.java:25) at org.dementhium.task.SequentialTaskExecutor.performTasks(SequentialTas kExecutor.java:13) at org.dementhium.model.World.run(World.java:174) at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRunAndReset(Unknown Source)
at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.runAndReset(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask. access$301(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask. run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.NullPointerException at org.dementhium.model.player.Bonuses.getBonus(Bonuses.java:63) at org.dementhium.model.combat.MagicFormulae.getMaximumMagicDefence(Magi cFormulae.java:94) at org.dementhium.model.combat.MagicFormulae.getDamage(MagicFormulae.jav a:31) at org.dementhium.model.combat.impl.spells.NPCSpell.castSpell(NPCSpell.j ava:29) at org.dementhium.model.combat.impl.MagicAction.commenceSession(MagicAct ion.java:62) at org.dementhium.model.combat.CombatAction.execute(CombatAction.java:38 ) at org.dementhium.model.combat.CombatExecutor$1.run(CombatExecutor.java: 81) at org.dementhium.model.combat.CombatExecutor.tick(CombatExecutor.java:9 6) at org.dementhium.task.impl.NPCTickTask.execute(NPCTickTask.java:25) at org.dementhium.task.SequentialTaskExecutor.performTasks(SequentialTas kExecutor.java:13) at org.dementhium.model.World.run(World.java:174) at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRunAndReset(Unknown Source)
at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.runAndReset(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask. access$301(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask. run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.NullPointerException at org.dementhium.model.player.Bonuses.getBonus(Bonuses.java:63) at org.dementhium.model.combat.MagicFormulae.getMaximumMagicDefence(Magi cFormulae.java:94) at org.dementhium.model.combat.MagicFormulae.getDamage(MagicFormulae.jav a:31) at org.dementhium.model.combat.impl.spells.NPCSpell.castSpell(NPCSpell.j ava:29) at org.dementhium.model.combat.impl.MagicAction.commenceSession(MagicAct ion.java:62) at org.dementhium.model.combat.CombatAction.execute(CombatAction.java:38 ) at org.dementhium.model.combat.CombatExecutor$1.run(CombatExecutor.java: 81) at org.dementhium.model.combat.CombatExecutor.tick(CombatExecutor.java:9 6) at org.dementhium.task.impl.NPCTickTask.execute(NPCTickTask.java:25) at org.dementhium.task.SequentialTaskExecutor.performTasks(SequentialTas kExecutor.java:13) at org.dementhium.model.World.run(World.java:174) at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRunAndReset(Unknown Source)
at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.runAndReset(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask. access$301(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask. run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
any help please??

item.title: Urgent help needed please!
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

Some null, in the Combat class.
